Index >  IfUseTwainDSM

IfUseTwainDSM

Description

Returns or sets whether the new TWAIN DSM (Data Source Manager) is used for acquisitions. The new TWAIN DSM is a .dll file called 'TWAINDSM.dll'. By default, the old DSM is used ('twain_32.dll' under 'C:\Windows').

Data type

bool

Default value

false

Syntax

.IfUseTwainDSM = true;

Remarks

Set this property before any TWAIN related methods or properties are used.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.
